mapper.select: SELECT s.*, d.departmentName, file.majorUnit, file.cultureUnit FROM (student s LEFT JOIN department d ON s.departmentId = d.id) LEFT JOIN student_gradefile file ON s.id = file.id
SELECT Student.*, Department.departmentName FROM Student JOIN Department ON Student.departmentId = Department.id WHERE Student.id=#{studentId}
SELECT s.*, pq.quizContent from student s LEFT JOIN passwordquiz pq ON s.passwordQuestion = pq.quizCode WHERE id=#{id}

SELECT s.id, s.name, s.completeSemester, s.grade, s.departmentId, d.departmentName, ssg.subjectId, sub.name subjectName, file.majorUnit, file.cultureUnit FROM (((student s LEFT JOIN department d ON s.departmentId = d.id) LEFT JOIN student_subject_grade ssg ON s.id = ssg.id) LEFT JOIN subject sub ON ssg.subjectId = sub.id) LEFT JOIN student_gradefile file ON s.id = file.id
WHERE (#{departmentName} IS NULL OR #{departmentName}="전체" OR #{departmentName}=d.departmentName) AND (#{grade} IS NULL OR #{grade}="" OR #{grade}=s.grade) AND (#{allId} IS NULL OR #{allId}="" OR s.id LIKE CONCAT(#{allId}, '%')) AND (#{subjectName} IS NULL OR #{subjectName}="" OR #{subjectName}=sub.name OR sub.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{subjectName},'%')) AND (#{name} IS NULL OR #{name}="" OR #{name}=s.name) AND (#{id} IS NULL OR #{id}="" OR #{id}=s.id) AND (#{checkbox} IS NULL OR #{checkbox}="" OR (#{checkbox}="check" AND (s.completeSemester > 7))) GROUP BY s.departmentId, s.id

SELECT s.id, s.name, s.completeSemester, s.grade, s.departmentId, d.departmentName, ssg.subjectId, sub.name subjectName, file.majorUnit, file.cultureUnit FROM (((student s LEFT JOIN department d ON s.departmentId = d.id) LEFT JOIN student_subject_grade ssg ON s.id = ssg.id) LEFT JOIN subject sub ON ssg.subjectId = sub.id) LEFT JOIN student_gradefile file ON s.id = file.id WHERE (#{searchAll} IS NULL OR #{searchAll}="" OR (d.departmentName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchAll}, '%' )) OR (s.grade LIKE CONCAT(#{searchAll}, '%')) OR (s.id LIKE CONCAT(#{searchAll},'%')) OR (sub.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchAll},'%')) OR (s.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchAll},'%')) OR (s.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchAll},'%'))) GROUP BY s.id
mapper.insert: INSERT Student (id, name, departmentId, grade, entranceType, password, password2, passwordQuestion, passwordAnswer, email, completeSemester) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{departmentId}, #{grade}, #{entranceType}, #{password}, #{password2}, #{passwordQuestion}, #{passwordAnswer}, #{email}, #{completeSemester})
mapper.update: UPDATE student SET departmentId = #{departmentId}, grade = #{grade}, password = #{password}, password2 = #{password2}, passwordQuestion = #{passwordQuestion}, passwordAnswer=#{passwordAnswer}, email = #{email}, completeSemester = #{completeSemester} WHERE id=#{id}
UPDATE student SET password = #{password}, password2 = #{password2} WHERE id=#{id}
